title: CIPRIANI logo?
content:
Hi Typophiles

Need a little help with the CIPRIANI logo... Dunno if the A has been customized?

[http://www.cipriani.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101905/http:/www.cipriani.com/ "http://www.cipriani.com/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Billede 13.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101905/http:/typophile.com/files/Billede%2013.png) | 14.62 KB |
author: jaksi

comments.content: [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101905/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface) shares a few traits with your sample. You can see the N, C, and A are noticeably different. Maybe Neutraface was the starting point for the logo.
